content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Hello Emilia, I'm glad you found the apartment to your liking. Let's discuss the rental price. I'm sure we can find a mutually beneficial agreement.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: The apartment is in the city center, which is quite expensive. I propose a price of 1100 Euros per month. It includes all necessary facilities and amenities.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: That's a quite low offer, considering the prime location and facilities. I suggest we aim higher. How about 1500 euros per month? That would be more in line with the market value of similar apartments in the city center.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
I understand your point. However, the apartment is unfurnished, which makes it less valuable compared to a furnished one. A price of 1300 Euros per month would be more reasonable.
[CustomizableResponse]]
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I appreciate your perspective, Emilia. However, the unfurnished nature of the apartment is a non-issue as most tenants prefer to furnish their apartments to their own liking. I am willing to meet you halfway. How about 1400 euros per month? That's a fair compromise, in my opinion.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's a better offer. However, I have a tenant who is willing to pay 1350 Euros per month. They are a reliable tenant who pays on time. I'm inclined to give it to them.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I see, Emilia. If you already have a reliable tenant willing to pay 1350 euros per month, I understand why you'd consider them. However, I believe my offer of 1400 euros per month provides you with a better opportunity to maximize your profit. It's your decision to make, of course. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because you already have a tenant who is willing to pay a lower price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
Thank you for understanding, Emilia. I appreciate your time and effort in this negotiation. I will consider your offer and get back to you if I decide to move forward with it.
